sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {Input,CreateField,TextAreaAboutMe} from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import pc from './UserInfo.module.css' import {MaxLengthCreator, required} from "../../utils/validators"; const ProfileDataEditorForm = (props) => { return
My name is : {CreateField("Enter your full name","fullName",[],Input)}
are u looking for a job? : {CreateField("","lookingForAJob",[],Input,{type : "checkbox"})}
My professional skills: {CreateField("Enter description","lookingForAJobDescription",[], TextAreaAboutMe)}
about me: {CreateField("print something about you","aboutMe",[], TextAreaAboutMe)}
My contacts :
{Object.keys(props.contacts).map(key => { return
{key} : {CreateField(key,key,[],InputCreator(pc.input))}
})}
{props.error ?
{props.error}
: null}
} export default ProfileDataEditorForm
